resources.string:
• Enable Assistive Macros in Accessibility Settings 
 • Press "Create Macro" to start 
 • Press record from desired starting point 
 • Perform the sequence of commands 
 • Device BACK and HOME buttons not supported 
 • Stop button is draggable 
 • Stop 
 • Set Macro name 
 • A shortcut will be created
This is a Beta version please feel free to send us feedback!
